comments.body: Wait, we don't want a Hero transition? Why not?

In this case, there should not be a hero transition. This test is checking for what was causing an assertion error in #22025 and #28980. 

The route that is being *pushed on top of* does not contain the hero, so there should not be a transition. 
The route that is being *removed until* contains the hero, and was notifying the Hero observer, which is incorrect. 

The test above this validates that a hero transition is happening correctly when the route that is being *pushed on top of* contains the hero.
Makes sense! Maybe update the name of the test to contain a little more context about the tested scenario.
